snippet: GORVOY--Florence, passed peacefully in her home on Saturday, April 23 at the age of 94. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Jack Gorvoy, mother to Jill and Joseph, grandmother to Alex and Jana and great-grandmother to Gabriel. We will dearly miss her sweet and generous spirit, quick wit, and legendary mandelbrot. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GORVOY--Florence, passed peacefully in her home on Saturday, April 23 at the age of 94. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Jack Gorvoy, mother to Jill and Joseph, grandmother to Alex and Jana and great-grandmother to Gabriel. We will dearly miss her sweet and generous spirit, quick wit, and legendary mandelbrot. 1/3
